ValidationRule.description: An activity must be logged before changing the Status of a lead to any of the Sales Stages.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), NOT ( $User.LastName = "Leads"), ISPICKVAL(Source__c,"Inbound"), IsConverted = False, OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Sales 2: Prospecting" ), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Sales 3a: Not appropriate contact" ), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Sales 3b: Contact Identified" ), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Sales 4a: Interested" ), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Sales 4b: Not Interested" ), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Sales 5: Unresponsive" ), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Sales Qualified" ), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Sales Nurture" )), OR ( ISBLANK (BDR_Completed__c), BDR_Completed__c = 0))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: At least one task must be completed before changing lead status
